name: Uniblast
description:
_____________________________________

[Control]

-Move: W,A,S,D / L-Stick / D-Pad

-Shoot: Left Mouse Button / X Button

-Fullscreen: Alt + Enter

_____________________________________

Description:

Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. You only have one bullet that never stops. You have to catch it to fire again. All levels take place in a single room. Defeat all enemies to advance.

Developed solely by myself in 48-hours.
